title: Agency
description: We value diverse perspectives across disciplines, backgrounds and cultures. We amplify and center the voices of those working to improve access to information and communication for all.

title: Accessibility
description: We believe that accessibility benefits everyone. We prioritize equitable participation and access to communication.

title: Collaboration
description: We foster collaboration and knowledge-sharing to enrich our understanding and the development of impactful solutions. We prototype and build with communities, designing with affordability, access and context in mind.
